targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Übersicht ${LRA} Gesamt |  ${Monat_text} ${Jahr}'))), 'Übersicht ${LRA} Gesamt |  ${Monat:text} ${Jahr}'), 
FROM(
SELECT 'Übersicht ${LRA} Gesamt |  ${Monat:text} ${Jahr}' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('$LRA - Gesamt'))), '$LRA - Gesamt'), 
FROM(
SELECT '$LRA - Gesamt' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Apps'))), 'Apps'), 
FROM(
SELECT 'Apps' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

panels.description: Zugriffe gesamt aller Podcast-Reihen im ausgewählten Bereich

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(summe as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
  SELECT
  SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe
  FROM $episode_dataset
  WHERE 
  $Zeitraum
  AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH('ARD Audiothek')), 'ARD Audiothek')
FROM(
SELECT 'ARD Audiothek' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH('Spotify')), 'Spotify')
FROM(
SELECT 'Spotify' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH('Apple Podcasts'))), 'Apple Podcasts')
FROM(
SELECT 'Apple Podcasts' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT 
SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe,
platform
FROM $platform_dataset
WHERE 
$Zeitraum
AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
GROUP BY platform

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(summe as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", ".")) FROM 
(
    SELECT 
    SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe
    FROM $platform_dataset
    WHERE 
    platform = "ARD Audiothek" 
    AND 
    $Zeitraum
    AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(summe as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", ".")) FROM 
(
    SELECT 
    SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe
    FROM $platform_dataset
    WHERE 
    platform = "Spotify" 
    AND 
    $Zeitraum
    AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(summe as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", ".")) FROM 
(
    SELECT 
    SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe
    FROM $platform_dataset
    WHERE 
    platform = "Apple Podcasts" 
    AND 
    $Zeitraum
    AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
)

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 0), 'Veränderung im Vergleich zu:'), 
FROM(
SELECT 'Veränderung im Vergleich zu:' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)
SELECT ""

-- declare and set the value of Monat as the value of the variable "$Monat"
DECLARE Monat INT64;
SET Monat = $Monat;

-- if "Jahr" is selected, then select an empty string
IF Monat > 12 THEN 
  EXECUTE IMMEDIATE """
  SELECT CASE "${Monat:text}"
WHEN "Jahr" THEN CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH("$LastYear"))), "$LastYear")
WHEN "1. Quartal" THEN CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH("1. Quartal $LastYear"))), "1. Quartal $LastYear")
WHEN "2. Quartal" THEN CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH("2. Quartal $LastYear"))), "2. Quartal $LastYear")
WHEN "3. Quartal" THEN CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH("3. Quartal $LastYear"))), "3. Quartal $LastYear")
WHEN "4. Quartal" THEN CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH("4. Quartal $LastYear"))), "4. Quartal $LastYear")
WHEN "1. Halbjahr" THEN CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH("1. Halbjahr $LastYear"))), "1. Halbjahr $LastYear")
WHEN "2. Halbjahr" THEN CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH("2. Halbjahr $LastYear"))), "2. Halbjahr $LastYear")
END
""";
--CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH("$LastYear"))), "$LastYear")
-- if a month is selected, then compute the difference
ELSE 
  EXECUTE IMMEDIATE """
   SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(CONCAT('$LastMonat_abkuerzung', ' ', '$YearFromLastMonth')))), CONCAT('$LastMonat_abkuerzung', ' ', '$YearFromLastMonth')),
   CASE "${Monat:text}"
    WHEN "Jahr" THEN CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH("$LastYear"))), "$LastYear")
    WHEN "1. Quartal" THEN CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH("1. Quartal $LastYear"))), "1. Quartal $LastYear")

    WHEN "1. Halbjahr" THEN CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH("1. Halbjahr $LastYear"))), "1. Halbjahr $LastYear")
    WHEN "2. Halbjahr" THEN CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH("2. Halbjahr $LastYear"))), "2. Halbjahr $LastYear")
    ELSE CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH("$Monat_last_year_abkuerzung $LastYear"))), "$Monat_last_year_abkuerzung $LastYear")
    END
  """;
END IF;

SELECT ""

-- declare and set the value of Monat as the value of the variable "$Monat"
DECLARE Monat INT64;
SET Monat = $Monat;

-- if "Jahr" is selected, then select an empty string
IF Monat > 12 THEN 
  EXECUTE IMMEDIATE """
  WITH past_zugriffe AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS past_sum
  FROM $episode_dataset
  WHERE $vorjahresmonat_zeitraum
  AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
),
current_zugriffe AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS current_sum
  FROM $episode_dataset
  WHERE 
  $Zeitraum
  AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
)
SELECT
-- add "+" (if it is positive), reformat it to a german number, and add "%"
CASE
WHEN current_sum / past_sum - 1 > 0 THEN CONCAT("+",REPLACE(CAST(ROUND((current_sum / past_sum - 1) * 100,0) AS STRING),".",","),"%")
ELSE CONCAT(REPLACE(CAST(ROUND((current_sum / past_sum - 1) * 100,0) AS STRING),".",","),"%") END
FROM past_zugriffe, current_zugriffe
""";

-- if a month is selected, then compute the difference
ELSE 
  EXECUTE IMMEDIATE """
    WITH past_zugriffe AS(
    SELECT
  SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS past_sum
FROM $episode_dataset
WHERE $vorjahresvormonat_zeitraum
  AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
),
current_zugriffe AS(
    SELECT
  SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS current_sum
FROM $episode_dataset
WHERE $Zeitraum
  AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
),
past_zugriffe_vorjahresmonat AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS past_sum
  FROM $episode_dataset
  WHERE $vorjahresmonat_zeitraum
  AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
)
SELECT
    -- add "+" (if it is positive), reformat it to a german number, and add "%"
    CASE
    WHEN current_sum / past_zugriffe.past_sum - 1 > 0 THEN CONCAT("+",REPLACE(CAST(ROUND((current_sum / past_zugriffe.past_sum - 1) * 100,0) AS STRING),".",","),"%")
    ELSE CONCAT(REPLACE(CAST(ROUND((current_sum / past_zugriffe.past_sum - 1) * 100,0) AS STRING),".",","),"%") END,
    -- add "+" (if it is positive), reformat it to a german number, and add "%"
    CASE
    WHEN current_sum / past_zugriffe_vorjahresmonat.past_sum - 1 > 0 THEN CONCAT("+",REPLACE(CAST(ROUND((current_sum / past_zugriffe_vorjahresmonat.past_sum - 1) * 100,0) AS STRING),".",","),"%")
    ELSE CONCAT(REPLACE(CAST(ROUND((current_sum / past_zugriffe_vorjahresmonat.past_sum - 1) * 100,0) AS STRING),".",","),"%") END,
FROM past_zugriffe, current_zugriffe, past_zugriffe_vorjahresmonat
  """;
END IF;

-- declare and set the value of Monat as the value of the variable "$Monat"
DECLARE Monat INT64;
SET Monat = $Monat;

-- if "Jahr" is selected, then select an empty string
IF Monat > 12 THEN 
  EXECUTE IMMEDIATE """
  WITH past_zugriffe AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS past_sum
  FROM $platform_dataset
  WHERE $vorjahresmonat_zeitraum
  AND platform = "ARD Audiothek"
  AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
),
current_zugriffe AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS current_sum
  FROM $platform_dataset
  WHERE 
  $Zeitraum
  AND platform = "ARD Audiothek"
  AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
)
SELECT
-- add "+" (if it is positive), reformat it to a german number, and add "%"
CASE
WHEN current_sum / past_sum - 1 > 0 THEN CONCAT("+",REPLACE(CAST(ROUND((current_sum / past_sum - 1) * 100,0) AS STRING),".",","),"%")
ELSE CONCAT(REPLACE(CAST(ROUND((current_sum / past_sum - 1) * 100,0) AS STRING),".",","),"%") END
FROM past_zugriffe, current_zugriffe
""";

-- if a month is selected, then compute the difference
ELSE 
  EXECUTE IMMEDIATE """
    WITH past_zugriffe AS(
    SELECT
  SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS past_sum
FROM $platform_dataset
WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM date) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) 
        AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
        AND platform = "ARD Audiothek"
  AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
),
current_zugriffe AS(
    SELECT
  SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS current_sum
FROM $platform_dataset
WHERE $Zeitraum
AND platform = "ARD Audiothek"
  AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)

),
past_zugriffe_vorjahresmonat AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS past_sum
  FROM $platform_dataset
  WHERE $vorjahresmonat_zeitraum
  AND platform = "ARD Audiothek"
  AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
  
)
SELECT
    -- add "+" (if it is positive), reformat it to a german number, and add "%"
    CASE
    WHEN current_sum / past_zugriffe.past_sum - 1 > 0 THEN CONCAT("+",REPLACE(CAST(ROUND((current_sum / past_zugriffe.past_sum - 1) * 100,0) AS STRING),".",","),"%")
    ELSE CONCAT(REPLACE(CAST(ROUND((current_sum / past_zugriffe.past_sum - 1) * 100,0) AS STRING),".",","),"%") END,
    -- add "+" (if it is positive), reformat it to a german number, and add "%"
    CASE
    WHEN current_sum / past_zugriffe_vorjahresmonat.past_sum - 1 > 0 THEN CONCAT("+",REPLACE(CAST(ROUND((current_sum / past_zugriffe_vorjahresmonat.past_sum - 1) * 100,0) AS STRING),".",","),"%")
    ELSE CONCAT(REPLACE(CAST(ROUND((current_sum / past_zugriffe_vorjahresmonat.past_sum - 1) * 100,0) AS STRING),".",","),"%") END,
FROM past_zugriffe, current_zugriffe, past_zugriffe_vorjahresmonat
  """;
END IF;

WITH zugriffe_vormonat AS (

ORDER BY (
  CASE
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(LOWER("${__user.email}"), LOWER(a.LRA))
    THEN 1
    ELSE 0
  END
) DESC

query.rawSql:
SELECT branding FROM (SELECT DISTINCT branding, CASE branding WHEN "NDR Info" THEN -1 ELSE 1 END as sort 
FROM   $profiles_dataset
WHERE CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "MDR" THEN branding != "ARD Kultur"
ELSE TRUE END
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT "Alle Bereiche", 0 as sort)
WHERE branding != ""
Order by sort, branding ASC

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "NDR" THEN "Piano.NDR_podcast_profiles"
WHEN "MDR" THEN "Piano.MDR_podcast_profiles_mapping" END

WITH all_podcasts AS(
  SELECT podcast_title FROM $profiles_dataset
  WHERE CASE "$LRA"
  WHEN "MDR" THEN branding != "ARD Kultur"
  ELSE TRUE END
  UNION ALL
  SELECT "Alle Titel" as podcast_title
)
SELECT podcast_title FROM(
SELECT DISTINCT REPLACE(podcast_title,'"','') AS podcast_title, CASE podcast_title WHEN "Alle Titel" THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS sort  FROM all_podcasts
ORDER BY sort,podcast_title DESC
)
ORDER BY SORT, LOWER(podcast_title) ASC

WITH all_genres AS(
  SELECT genre FROM $profiles_dataset
  UNION ALL
  SELECT "Alle Genres" as genre 
)
SELECT genre FROM(
SELECT DISTINCT REPLACE(genre,'"','') AS genre, CASE genre WHEN "Alle Genres" THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS sort  FROM all_genres
ORDER BY sort,genre DESC
)
ORDER BY SORT, LOWER(genre) ASC

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "NDR" THEN "Piano.NDR_podcast_platform_daily_f_mapped"
WHEN "MDR" THEN "Piano.MDR_podcast_platform_daily_f" END

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "NDR" THEN "Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_daily_f_mapped"
WHEN "MDR" THEN "Piano.MDR_podcast_episode_daily_f" END

query.rawSql:
SELECT 
    CASE "${Monat:text}"
    WHEN "Jahr" THEN "EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = $Jahr"
    WHEN "1. Quartal" THEN "date BETWEEN DATE($Jahr,1,1) AND DATE($Jahr,3,31)"
    WHEN "2. Quartal" THEN "date BETWEEN DATE($Jahr,4,1) AND DATE($Jahr,6,30)"
    WHEN "3. Quartal" THEN "date BETWEEN DATE($Jahr,7,1) AND DATE($Jahr,9,30)"
    WHEN "4. Quartal" THEN "date BETWEEN DATE($Jahr,10,1) AND DATE($Jahr,12,31)"
    WHEN "1. Halbjahr" THEN "date BETWEEN DATE($Jahr,1,1) AND DATE($Jahr,6,30)"
    WHEN "2. Halbjahr" THEN "date BETWEEN DATE($Jahr,7,1) AND DATE($Jahr,12,31)"
    ELSE "EXTRACT(MONTH from date) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from date) = $Jahr"
    END

--REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE("${hinweis_comp_last_month}","#### ",""),"zum Vormonat", ""),"Verä", "Ä"),"(",""), ")","")

SELECT CASE
WHEN $Monat > 12 THEN REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE("${hinweis_comp_last_month}","#### ",""),"zum Vormonat", ""),"Verä", "Ä")
ELSE CONCAT("% ",REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE("${hinweis_comp_last_month}","#### ",""),"zum Vormonat", ""),"Verä", "Ä")) END
--REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE("${hinweis_comp_last_month}","#### ",""),"zum Vormonat", ""),"Verä", "Ä"),"(",""), ")","")

SELECT CASE "${Monat:text}"
WHEN "Jahr" THEN CONCAT("Absolute ",REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE("${hinweis_comp_last_year}","#### ",""),"zum Vorjahr", ""),"Verä", "Ä"))
WHEN "1. Quartal" THEN CONCAT("Absolute ",REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE("${hinweis_comp_last_year}","#### ",""),"zum 1. Vorjahrquartal", ""),"Verä", "Ä"))
WHEN "2. Quartal" THEN CONCAT("Absolute ",REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE("${hinweis_comp_last_year}","#### ",""),"zum 2. Vorjahrquartal", ""),"Verä", "Ä"))
WHEN "3. Quartal" THEN CONCAT("Absolute ",REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE("${hinweis_comp_last_year}","#### ",""),"zum 3. Vorjahrquartal", ""),"Verä", "Ä"))
WHEN "4. Quartal" THEN CONCAT("Absolute ",REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE("${hinweis_comp_last_year}","#### ",""),"zum 4. Vorjahrquartal", ""),"Verä", "Ä"))
WHEN "1. Halbjahr" THEN CONCAT("Absolute ",REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE("${hinweis_comp_last_year}","#### ",""),"zum 1. Vorhalbjahr", ""),"Verä", "Ä"))
WHEN "2. Halbjahr" THEN CONCAT("Absolute ",REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE("${hinweis_comp_last_year}","#### ",""),"zum 2. Vorhalbjahr", ""),"Verä", "Ä"))
ELSE CONCAT("Absolute ",REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE("${hinweis_comp_last_year}","#### ",""),"zum Vorjahresmonat", ""),"Verä", "Ä"))
END
--REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE("${hinweis_comp_last_year}","#### ",""),"zum Vorjahresmonat", ""),"Verä", "Ä"),"(",""), ")","")

SELECT CASE "${Monat:text}"
WHEN "Jahr" THEN CONCAT("% ",REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE("${hinweis_comp_last_year}","#### ",""),"zum Vorjahr", ""),"Verä", "Ä"))
WHEN "1. Quartal" THEN CONCAT("% ",REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE("${hinweis_comp_last_year}","#### ",""),"zum 1. Vorjahrquartal", ""),"Verä", "Ä"))
WHEN "2. Quartal" THEN CONCAT("% ",REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE("${hinweis_comp_last_year}","#### ",""),"zum 2. Vorjahrquartal", ""),"Verä", "Ä"))
WHEN "3. Quartal" THEN CONCAT("% ",REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE("${hinweis_comp_last_year}","#### ",""),"zum 3. Vorjahrquartal", ""),"Verä", "Ä"))
WHEN "4. Quartal" THEN CONCAT("% ",REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE("${hinweis_comp_last_year}","#### ",""),"zum 4. Vorjahrquartal", ""),"Verä", "Ä"))
WHEN "1. Halbjahr" THEN CONCAT("% ",REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE("${hinweis_comp_last_year}","#### ",""),"zum 1. Vorhalbjahr", ""),"Verä", "Ä"))
WHEN "2. Halbjahr" THEN CONCAT("% ",REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE("${hinweis_comp_last_year}","#### ",""),"zum 2. Vorhalbjahr", ""),"Verä", "Ä"))
ELSE CONCAT("% ",REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE("${hinweis_comp_last_year}","#### ",""),"zum Vorjahresmonat", ""),"Verä", "Ä"))
END

SELECT CONCAT("date BETWEEN ", "'",DATE_SUB("$min_date", INTERVAL 1 YEAR),"' AND '", DATE_SUB("$max_date", INTERVAL 1 YEAR), "'")

SELECT COALESCE(MIN(date),DATE(2000,1,1)) as min_date
  FROM $episode_dataset
  WHERE $Zeitraum

SELECT COALESCE(MAX(date),DATE(2000,1,1)) as min_date
  FROM $episode_dataset
  WHERE $Zeitraum
SELECT FORMAT_DATE('%d.%m.%Y',DATE_SUB("$min_date", INTERVAL 1 YEAR))
SELECT FORMAT_DATE('%d.%m.%Y',DATE_SUB("$max_date", INTERVAL 1 YEAR))

SELECT CASE 
  WHEN "${Monat:text}" = "Jahr" THEN 
  CASE WHEN CURRENT_DATE() >= DATE($Jahr+1, 1,5) THEN "Veränderung zum Vorjahr ($LastYear)"
  WHEN "$min_date" = "2000-01-01" AND "$max_date" = "2000-01-01" THEN "Veränderung zum Vorjahr ($LastYear)"
  ELSE "Veränderung zum Vorjahr ($min_date_last_year_formated - $max_date_last_year_formated)" END
  WHEN "${Monat:text}" = "1. Quartal" THEN
  CASE WHEN CURRENT_DATE() >= DATE($Jahr, 4,5) THEN "Veränderung zum 1. Vorjahresquartal ($LastYear)"
  WHEN "$min_date" = "2000-01-01" AND "$max_date" = "2000-01-01" THEN "Veränderung zum 1. Vorjahresquartal ($LastYear)"
  ELSE "Veränderung zum 1. Vorjahresquartal ($min_date_last_year_formated - $max_date_last_year_formated)" END
  WHEN "${Monat:text}" = "2. Quartal" THEN
  CASE WHEN CURRENT_DATE() >= DATE($Jahr, 7,5) THEN "Veränderung zum 2. Vorjahresquartal ($LastYear)"
  WHEN "$min_date" = "2000-01-01" AND "$max_date" = "2000-01-01" THEN "Veränderung zum 2. Vorjahresquartal ($LastYear)"
  ELSE "Veränderung zum 2. Vorjahresquartal ($min_date_last_year_formated - $max_date_last_year_formated)" END
  WHEN "${Monat:text}" = "3. Quartal" THEN
  CASE WHEN CURRENT_DATE() >= DATE($Jahr, 10,5) THEN "Veränderung zum 3. Vorjahresquartal ($LastYear)"
  WHEN "$min_date" = "2000-01-01" AND "$max_date" = "2000-01-01" THEN "Veränderung zum 3. Vorjahresquartal ($LastYear)"
  ELSE "Veränderung zum 3. Vorjahresquartal ($min_date_last_year_formated - $max_date_last_year_formated)" END
  WHEN "${Monat:text}" = "4. Quartal" THEN
  CASE WHEN CURRENT_DATE() >= DATE($Jahr+1, 1,5) THEN "Veränderung zum 4. Vorjahresquartal ($LastYear)"
  WHEN "$min_date" = "2000-01-01" AND "$max_date" = "2000-01-01" THEN "Veränderung zum 4. Vorjahresquartal ($LastYear)"
  ELSE "Veränderung zum 4. Vorjahresquartal ($min_date_last_year_formated - $max_date_last_year_formated)" END
  WHEN "${Monat:text}" = "1. Halbjahr" THEN
  CASE WHEN CURRENT_DATE() >= DATE($Jahr, 7,5) THEN "Veränderung zum 1. Vorhalbjahr ($LastYear)"
  WHEN "$min_date" = "2000-01-01" AND "$max_date" = "2000-01-01" THEN "Veränderung zum 1. Vorhalbjahr ($LastYear)"
  ELSE "Veränderung zum 1. Vorhalbjahr ($min_date_last_year_formated - $max_date_last_year_formated)" END
  WHEN "${Monat:text}" = "2. Halbjahr" THEN
  CASE WHEN CURRENT_DATE() >= DATE($Jahr+1, 1,5) THEN "Veränderung zum 2. Vorhalbjar ($LastYear)"
  WHEN "$min_date" = "2000-01-01" AND "$max_date" = "2000-01-01" THEN "Veränderung zum 2. Vorhalbjahr ($LastYear)"
  ELSE "Veränderung zum 2. Vorhalbjahr ($min_date_last_year_formated - $max_date_last_year_formated)" END
  ELSE CASE 
  WHEN CURRENT_DATE() >= DATE_ADD(DATE($Jahr, $Monat,5), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) THEN "Veränderung zum Vorjahresmonat ($Monat_last_year_abkuerzung $LastYear)"
  WHEN "$min_date" = "2000-01-01" AND "$max_date" = "2000-01-01" THEN "Veränderung zum Vorjahresmonat ($Monat_last_year_abkuerzung $LastYear)"
  ELSE "Veränderung zum Vorjahresmonat ($min_date_last_year_formated - $max_date_last_year_formated)" END
  END

FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_daily_f`
WHERE date > DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 20 day)
SELECT CONCAT(FORMAT_DATETIME("%d.%m.%Y", "$min_date")," – ",FORMAT_DATETIME("%d.%m.%Y", "$max_date"))

SELECT platform FROM (SELECT DISTINCT platform, 1 as sort 
FROM   $platform_dataset
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT "Alle Plattformen", 0 as sort)
WHERE platform != ""
Order by sort, platform ASC
